actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to extinguish and compensate for valid mining claims in the Three Sisters Wilderness Area, Deschutes and Willamette National Forests, State of Oregon.

summary.text: Terminates all mining claims in the Three Sisters Wilderness Area, Deschutes and Willamette National Forests, Oregon. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to compensate holders of certified valid claims. Withdraws the Three Sisters Wilderness from appropriation under the United States mining laws and from disposition under all laws pertaining to mineral leasing.

titles.title: A bill to extinguish and compensate for valid mining claims in the Three Sisters Wilderness Area, Deschutes and Willamette National Forests, State of Oregon.
